      Classes in ca.eandb.jmist.framework.accel that implement Bounded3 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BBHSceneElement
      A decorator SceneElement that applies a bounding box hierarchy to the decorated SceneElement to accelerate ray-intersection tests.
      class  BoundingIntervalHierarchy
      A decorator SceneElement that applies a bounded interval hierarchy (BIH) to the primitives of the underlying SceneElement.

      class  AbstractGeometry
      Base class for geometry classes.

      A SceneElement that is composed of component geometries.
      class  ConstructiveSolidGeometry
      An abstract SceneElement that combines other geometries using a boolean expression.
      class  InsideOutGeometry
      A SceneElement decorator that flips another SceneElement inside out.
      class  IntersectionGeometry
      A SceneElement that is the intersection of its component geometries.
      class  PrimitiveGeometry
      A SceneElement composed of a single primitive.
      class  PrimitiveListGeometry

      A SceneElement that is the first component geometry minus the union of all subsequent component geometries.
      class  TransformableGeometry
      A CompositeGeometry that may be transformed.
      class  UnionGeometry
      A SceneElement that is the union of all its component geometries.

      An empty Scene.

      A SceneElement decorator that adds hair to the underlying geometry.
      class  MaterialMapSceneElement
      A decorator SceneElement that applies Materials to the primitives of the underlying SceneElement according to a mapping from primitive index to Material.
      class  MaterialSceneElement
      A decorator SceneElement that applies a Material to the underlying SceneElement.

      A SceneElement that merges one or more child scene elements into a single SceneElement.

      A SceneElement consisting of a range of primitives from another SceneElement.

      class  TrimmingSceneElement
      A SceneElement decorator that trims the decorated SceneElement.
